name: Real Cars Tournament 5: Burnout
description:
"Destroy Enemies with unique Super Powers and win new Cars"

=This game has vehicular violence.
=The songs have the respective permission of the author.
=The lyrics of some songs have inappropriate language.

Historical review:
After defeating the boss of RCT4, you discover another tournament is held in this installment will travel through different parts of the world to defeat other enemies and bosses, the tournament challenges up to 8 cars in the same area with high levels of difficulty ... to compete against "Burnout" the best player on the planet.

On the mechanics of the game:
Each car has a "Super" power.
You have to catch brown boxes to accumulate power and also shoot enemies.
The game contains a "Tutorial".

3 game modes:
Arcade: Choose your car, enemies and the world.
Quest: Play levels, defeat every boss and win his car.
Survival: Choose your car, enemies and the world in an endless game and final score.

In total there are 9 cars to unlock.

More updates Soon!
